Articles.Content:
For my first KSP video, I've made a 25 minute voyage from launch to splashdown of the Apollo 4 mission, using the Real Solar System and a host of other realism mods. It should be noted that it's not intended to be an accurate recreation of Apollo 4 -- more of a mission inspired by that flight. I intend to do a series of others, with Apollo 5 next, all leading up to the inevitable manned landing on the Moon.

Enjoy!
